Both parties herein agree to resolve any dispute regarding interpretation of the Contract in the following methods:
I.
Should both Parties be unable to reach an agreement within one month through negotiation, they may apply for an
arbitration in Miaoli County and the arbitration result shall be compulsory.
II.
Should either Party herein initiate a legal proceeding for revoking any arbitration result regarding the Contract, both Parties
herein agree to take the Miaoli District Court of Taiwan as the competent court of first instance pursuant to the laws of the
R.O.C..
perturbation.changed_text:
Both parties herein agree to resolve any dispute regarding interpretation of the Contract in the following methods:
I.
Should both Parties be unable to reach an agreement within one month through negotiation, they *may* apply for an
arbitration in Miaoli County, but the arbitration results are non-binding and serve only as recommendations.
II.
Should either Party herein initiate a legal proceeding for revoking any arbitration result regarding the Contract, both Parties
herein agree to take the Miaoli District Court of Taiwan as the competent court of first instance pursuant to the laws of the
R.O.C..
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'shall be compulsory' to 'non-binding and serve only as recommendations' weakens the enforceability of the arbitration clause, contradicting the standard understanding of binding arbitration. By removing the mandatory nature of the arbitration results, the clause becomes significantly less effective as a dispute resolution mechanism. This creates a legal contradiction between stating arbitration is possible and undermining its authority.

Outsourced Work

Outsourced work regarding this Contract is stated below:
Part I: Establishment of Architectural Development Plan and Business Plan
I.
Establishment of documents and drawing relevant to the Architectural Development Plan and Business Plan
II.

2.

Part II: Development of Soil and Water Conservation Plan

2.
Design of disasters prevention facilities during construction.
3.
Design of desilting and detention basin.
4.
Designs and drawings relevant to soil and water conservation.

1.
Attendance of review meetings and presentations

Signing & Verification of Technicians
Signing and verification relevant to land preparation and water discharge of the project.

The addition of the sentence absolves them from full responsibility and places it in a precarious state. Party A may view this as insufficient for contract resolution.
